song.title: Sentimental Wildness
song.info: This is my first released 4-channel MOD that was really composed on Amiga (I bought an A600), while being on vacations in the village with my girlfriend and grandma (my old Amiga MODs were not released, and all the released ones were made on PC using St3). This time I plugged my AMiGA to old russian black-and-white TV "Oreol" and tracked music in the deep deep night...That was so romantic! Style and sound are inspired by Mike Oldfield, let's call this a new age/rock tune.
